name: Little Yellow Guys Bomber
description:
Rush through everything which is moving upside down. With this amazing puzzle game that will give you so many different options, run to collect items, defeat the bosses each level. But beware the Troublemaker that try to trick you.

Features
- more than 35 checkpoints brutal stage.
- Familiar Gameplay with touchscreen control system.
- Collect the power. Plan wisely for victory.
- The outfit with added ability to eliminate bosses.
- Collect coins to unlock new bomb.
- The powerful bosses and minions that annoyed you.
- PVP fight mode with AI.
- Wonderful scenes decor and atmosphere.
